sentences.sContent: The good news for committed shoppers is a so-called 'soft break' – a few minutes rest grabbing a coffee, for example - can reinvigorate our senses, although only temporarily.
sentences.sContent_eng: The good news for committed shoppers is a so-called 'soft break' – a few minutes rest grabbing a coffee, for example - can reinvigorate our senses, although only temporarily.
sentences.sCn: 对于那些热衷购物的人来说，好消息是，稍事休息一下——比如花几分钟喝杯咖啡——可以使我们的感官重新振作，虽然这仅是暂时的。

trans.tranCn: 使重新振作； 使恢复活力
trans.tranOther: to put vitality and vigour back into (someone or something)
